body: Yes, we should allow for destructor to be nullptr in the case where there is API that requires a managed tensor but there is no way for the caller to actually provide a reasonable destructor.
body_html: Yes, we should allow for destructor to be nullptr in the case where there is API that requires a managed tensor but there is no way for the caller to actually provide a reasonable destructor.
body_text: Yes, we should allow for destructor to be nullptr in the case where there is API that requires a managed tensor but there is no way for the caller to actually provide a reasonable destructor.
